call.name: Day Bundle
call.desc: The Jazz Day Bundle Offer allows you to enjoy 300 Jazz minutes, 300 SMS, and 20MB of internet.  All of this in just Rs. 14 (inclusive of tax)..
call.terms: Call set up fee is applicable Overage of Re. 1.2/MB applies in case incentives have been exhaustedActual internet speed will depend on multiple factors like sim, device, web pages accessed, time of day, number of simultaneous users, distance from 2G/3G/4G site etcIf you are not subscribed to any bundle base rate will be charged i.e. Rs.5/MB. Charging pulse will be 512

call.name: Daily Super
call.desc: Jazz introduces yet another best value bundle. Now, with the Super Bundle, you receive 1440 Jazz and Warid minutes for an entire day! Just dial *444# and select Super Bundle or directly dial *212#.

call.name: Work From Home Bunble
call.desc: Jazz introduced super offer due to corona-virus. With work from home bundle get 10 GB data and unlimited jazz mins from 8am to 6pm for the entire week.

call.name: Haftawar All Rounder Packages(Selected Cities Only)
call.desc: Jazz introduces the exciting Haftawar All Rounder Offer! With this weekly hybrid offer, you get SMS, loads of Jazz minutes and internet. All of this only for Rs. 120 per week (inclusive of tax). Offer is valid for: Akora, Khattak, Bannu, Barawal, Bandi, Batkhela, Charsada, Chitral, DI Khan, Dir, Hangu, Jaffarabad, Karak, Khuzdar, Kohat, Kumbar, Maidan, Lakki Marwat, Mardan, Nowshera, Parachinar, Peshawar, Quetta, Samarbagh, Jandool, Sarai, Naurang, Shabqadar, Swabi, Takht, Bhai,  Tank, Thal, Timergara, Topi, Torkham, Wana, Wari, Zhob, Ziarat

call.name: Weekly Voice Offer
call.desc: Jazz weekly voice offer comes with 500 mins for the whole week. And subscribers can share 30 Jazz minutes to any other Jazz prepaid number.

call.name: Weekly All Network Package
call.desc: Jazz brings yet another exciting offer for its customers! With the Weekly All Network Offer you can make on-net and off-net calls, send SMS and surf the internet for 7 days. All of this in just Rs.170 (inclusive of tax) per week!

call.name: Super Duper Offer
call.desc: You get 1500 on-net minutes, 1500 SMS, 3000 MBs of mobile internet and 60 other-network minutes for Rs. 210 per week.

call.name: Super Plus Offer
call.desc: Weekly Super Plus Bundle – 12 GB (6 GB 2am-2pm) data, 5000 on-net minutes, 5000 SMS, 60 Off-net minutes at Rs. 240 (incl. tax).

call.name: Weekly Super Max Offer
call.desc: Weekly Super Max Bundle comes with  30 GB ?DATA [10 GBs + 10 GBs (2 AM – 2 PM) + 10 GBs YouTube], 6000 on-net minutes, 6000 SMS, 60 Off-net minutes at Rs. 299 (incl. tax).

call.name: Mahana Bachat Offer
call.desc: Jazz introduced Mahana Bachat Offer with 2000 MB’s of internet data,  200 Jazz mins, 20 off-net mins, and 3000 SMS for the whole month in just RS. 85 (Inc. taxes).

call.name: Monthly Hybrid Bundle
call.desc: Jazz brings an exciting Monthly Hybrid Bundle! 333 Free on-net minutes will be allocated on a daily basis. Now you can call your loved ones, send SMS and use the Internet as much as you want – and that too for the entire month. And this is not it, you can also enjoy unlimited calling on Sundays.

call.name: Monthly Super Duper
call.desc: Jazz offers its Monthly Super Duper package that comes with 3000 monthly on-net minutes, 150 off-net minutes, 3000 SMS, and 5000 MBs of Mobile Internet. All this for just Rs. 600 (including tax) per month.

call.name: Super Duper Card
call.desc: Jazz brings its Jazz Super Duper Card that comes with 2000 monthly on-net minutes, 150 off-net minutes, 2000 SMS and 2000 MBs of Mobile Internet. All this for just Rs. 600 (including tax) per month.

call.name: Monthly Super Duper Plus Offer
call.desc: Jazz introduces an exciting all-in-one offer to cater all your communication needs. With Jazz Monthly Super Duper Plus, call your loved ones on any network, send SMS, and use the best 3G internet for an entire month without any hassle.

call.name: VOICE INFINITY Offer
call.desc: Now make calls to other Jazz Numbers in just Rs.40 Incl.Tax, with Unlimited validity and no call setup fee!

othersHybrid.name: Make Your Own Bundle
othersHybrid.desc:
*303*1# for Daily Validity Status
*303*7# for Daily Validity Status
*303*30# for Daily Validity Status

othersHybrid.name: Super Plus
othersHybrid.desc: Daily Super Plus bundle comes with   500 Mb data, 500 on-net minutes, 500 SMS, and 5 Off-net minutes at Rs.  28 (incl. tax).

othersHybrid.name: New SIM Offer
othersHybrid.desc: Now buy a new Jazz + Warid SIM and get an amazing deal by dialing *191#. You will get 700 Jazz + Warid Minutes (except 6pm-10pm) , 700 SMS and 700 MBs (except 9pm-1am) internet for 7 days. This incentive can only be availed once. To avail Weekly Internet Bundle on New SIM, dial *989#, offer details are given above.

othersHybrid.name: Weekly Hybrid
othersHybrid.desc: With Jazz Weekly Hybrid offer, get 1000 OnNet minutes, 20 offNet minutes, 500 MB’s of internet and 1000 SMS for a whole week in just Rs. 115 (Incl. tax).

othersHybrid.name: Supreme Hybrid Package (Selected Cities Only)
othersHybrid.desc: Jazz is offering this amazing monthly package with free on-net, off-net, SMS and mobile internet. Offer is valid only for: Quetta, Mandi Bahauddin, Pishin, Phalia, Dinga & other areas.

sms.name: Daily WhatsApp & SMS Bundle
sms.desc: If you love texting round the clock or you text only when required, whatever the case is Jazz has you covered and that too at affordable rates!

sms.name: Super F&F Package
sms.desc: Free unlimited voice calls and SMS to one Super Friend or Family Number.

internet.name: Free WhatsApp Offer
internet.desc: Jazz brings Free WhatsApp offer for its valued customers. Now get 65 MBs of WhatsApp absolutely free on every call, for up to 10 calls in a day. Dial *225# and subscribe to the Jazz free WhatsApp offer and start calling!
internet.terms: Call set up fee is applicable Overage of Re. 1.2/MB applies in case incentives have been exhaustedActual internet speed will depend on multiple factors like sim, device, web pages accessed, time of day, number of simultaneous users, distance from 2G/3G/4G site etcIf you are not subscribed to any bundle base rate will be charged i.e. Rs.5/MB. Charging pulse will be 512

internet.name: Daily Browser Offer
internet.desc: Get 50 MB’s of internet data daily in just RS. 11.95 (incl. Taxes).

internet.name: Daily YouTube & Social
internet.desc: For Whatsapp, Youtube and Facebook usage only, this special 3G / 4G bundle allows a data limit of 1000 MBs per day.

internet.name: Daily Extreme
internet.desc: Get 2GB(12 AM to 12 PM) of internet data for a whole day in just RS. 15 (incl. Taxes).

internet.name: Daily Mega
internet.desc: Jazz Brings Daily Mega offer for its valued customers. Now enjoy Jazz Super 4G Internet for the whole day. With the new Offer, subscribers can use 1000 MB for the day for only Rs.27  (Incl. tax)

internet.name: Free Music Bundle
internet.desc: Jazz is offering 50MBs of mobile internet and another 50MBs of Saavn Streaming for free against a daily charge of Rs. 20 (including taxes) only.

locationBase.name: Gujranwala Super Data Offer
locationBase.desc: Free unlimited voice calls and SMS to one Super Friend or Family Number.

locationBase.name: Apna Shehar Package(Seleted cities)
locationBase.desc: This package comes with Unlimited on-net calling, 1500 SMS and 100MBs of mobile internet.

locationBase.name: Punjab Package (Selected Cities)
locationBase.desc: Jazz, comes up with an exciting offer for the proud residents of Alipur Chatha, Chawinda, Chiniot/Rabwa, Dinga, Gujranwala, Hafizabad, Jalalour Bhattian, Malakwal, Mandi Bahauddin, Pasrur, Phalia and other areas.

locationBase.name: Sindh Package
locationBase.desc: Jazz, comes up with an exciting offer for the proud residents of Hyderabad, Dadu, Jamshoro, Kotri, Mirpur Khas,Tando Adam, Tando Alayaar and other areas.

locationBase.name: Karachi Daily Package (For Khi Only)
locationBase.desc: Jazz comes up with an exciting offer for the proud residents of the city of lights–Karachi!. Now, customers in Karachi can make unlimited calls to all the Jazz and Warid numbers in Pakistan in just Rs. 12 (inclusive of tax) valid for same day mid-night.

locationBase.name: KPK Daily Offer
locationBase.desc: KPK Daily Offer comes with Unlimited on-net calls for the entire day, 1500 SMS plus 250 MBs of Mobile internet.

locationBase.name: Sargodha Weekly Offer
locationBase.desc: Jazz Sargodha Weekly Offer comes with 2000 Mbs for the Internet, 2000 Jazz minutes, and 200 SMS for the proud residents of Sargodha & Bhalwal!

others.name: Jazz Sim Lagao Offer
others.desc: With the SIM Lagao Offer, Jazz brings you a brand new reactivation offer! All those subscribers who haven’t used their SIM for the last 30 days, can enjoy 50 Jazz minutes daily, 3000 SMS and 6 GBs (3 GBs for WhatsApp) of the internet for 60 Days. In addition, on the usage of Rs. 15 (inclusive of tax) or more, customers can avail 50 Jazz+Warid minutes, 50 SMS & 50 MBs (2G and except 9 pm-1 am) of internet valid for 1 day. To avail the offer, just dial *551#

others.name: Jazz 3 Day Max Offer
others.desc: Get 1000 MB’s of internet data and 100 Jazz Warid mins for 3 days in just RS. 35 (incl. Taxes).

others.name: Jazz Give A Bundle
others.desc: With Jazz Give-A-Bundle, Gift 1 GB Data and 100 Jazz Minutes to your loved ones for 3 days in just Rs. 35 (inc. tax).

others.name: Jazz Voice Infinity Offer
others.desc: With voice infinity offer, Jazz customers can enjoy 100 Mins valid for 6 monthss in just Rs. 40 (Inc. tax).

others.name: Jazz Saudia Arabia & UAE Offer
others.desc: Talk to your loved ones in KSA for Rs.2.38 per 15 sec & UAE for Rs.3.57 per 15 sec without any subscription charges.

others.name: Jazz UK Offer
others.desc: Jazz now brings an exclusive offer for its customers to stay connected at the most economical call rates to UK (Landline + Mobile). Talk to your loved ones in the UK for Rs.1.2/30 sec without any subscription charges.
